item.title: Tracking Computing Job Progress Using sendxmpp
item.author: pmeckoni@gmail.com (Prashant Meckoni)
item.description: Tracking the progress of scientific computing jobs using sendxmpp and XMPP is easy. This is extremely useful when running jobs remotely.
